name: Czech Crypto Week Opening Party
short_description: Kick off Czech Crypto Week with a relaxed, decentralized hangout! Join fellow crypto enthusiasts already in Prague for an informal evening of networking and conversations over drinks.

name: ETHPrague 2025
short_description: A conference focused on Ethereum development and innovation.
description: ETHPrague is a leading Ethereum conference focusing on innovation, development, and the future of web3. Join developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts for three days of talks, workshops, and networking in the heart of Prague.

name: Interoperability meetup in Prague
short_description: Hosted by Neon EVM, this meetup will cover blockchain interoperability, scaling solutions, and the future of Ethereum, bringing together builders from various ecosystems.
description:
‚ÄãJoin us for an event to talk blockchain interoperability, what hurdles we still need to solve to achieve true interoperability, and what we're already doing right already. Connect with fellow builders, protocol teams, and ecosystem leaders pushing the boundaries of multichain innovation. Whether you're building on EVM, Solana, or beyond ‚Äî this is where the ecosystems converge.

‚ÄãWe would like to invite you to attend a side event during ETHPrague 2025. At this meetup, we will discuss various solutions for scaling projects and the future of Ethereum scaling.

**Agenda (in progress)**

> ‚òïÔ∏è 17:30 ‚Äî 18:00 Doors open: welcome coffee & networking
> 
> üé§ 18:00 ‚Äî 19:30 Keynotes and the panel discussion
> 
> üçª 19:30 ‚Äî 21:00 Networking, snacks & drinks

name: ETHGlobal Hackathon
short_description: A global hackathon bringing together Ethereum developers to build projects.
description: Join the world's premier Ethereum hackathon where developers collaborate to build innovative decentralized applications. With over $175,000 in prizes and support from industry leaders, this is your chance to turn your ideas into reality. The event features technical mentorship, workshops, exclusive swag, curated content, and free food & drinks.
prizes: $175,000 available in prizes from sponsors including Blockscout, 1inch, LayerZero, Flow, Pyth Network, Chainlink, and more

name: Based House @Prague
short_description: A mix of hands-on sessions, demos, and onchain experiences organized by Hive and supported by Base.
description:
Based House @Prague

Hive, a 12-week 0 equity program supported by Base that aims to support the global builders. Based house is organised by Hive and supported by Base.

Join us for a mix of hands-on sessions, demos, and onchain experiences. Let's get inspired together and build a better internet.

Agenda:

* 3 PM to 6 PM - Panels, Talks and Sessions
* 6 PM to 8 PM - Networking and F&B

About Hive:
As part of Hive's zero-equity, 12-week accelerator program, Based House supports teams through hands-on programming, live user testing, and high-impact demo days. It serves the dual purpose of a community incubator as well as a global launchpad for emerging Base projects in the Hive cohort.

About Base:
Base is a secure, low-cost, builder-friendly Ethereum L2 designed to help bring a billion users and a million developers onchain. Base transaction costs of less than 1 cent and speeds of less than 1 second make onchain technology more accessible to everyone. As an open and permissionless platform, we want to make it as easy and rewarding as possible for anyone to build and create on Base, to maintain ownership over their content, and earn revenue for their work. We're committed to engaging with and educating the developer community because we believe developers who build consumer applications are the key to unlocking an onchain future for all.

name: ProtoLayers Conference
short_description: An Ethereum research and development focused event by ProtoLayers.
description: Join ProtoLayers for a deep dive into cutting-edge Ethereum research and development. This focused event brings together researchers and developers to discuss the latest advances in Ethereum protocol, layer-2 solutions, and scaling technologies.

name: Urbe Campus
short_description: A 4-day bootcamp where students and beginner developers will be able to go from zero to hero with their Web3 development skills.
description: Urbe Campus is a 4-day bootcamp where students and beginner developers will be able to go from zero to hero with their Web3 development skills. This hands-on learning experience is designed to help newcomers quickly build practical Web3 development competencies.

name: BOB Hybrid & Chill Meetup - Prague üá®üáø
short_description: Join the BOB team for an evening of insights, networking, and great conversations with the BOB community and Bitcoin DeFi enthusiasts during Prague Blockchain Week.
description:
‚ÄãJoin the BOB team at the **BOB Hybrid & Chill Meetup - Prague.**

‚ÄãWe're bringing together the BOB community and Bitcoin DeFi enthusiasts for an evening of insights, networking, and great conversations. Come hang out with us during Prague Blockchain Week to hear the latest updates and connect with like-minded innovators. 

‚Äã**Who should attend**

* ‚ÄãBOB community
* ‚ÄãBitcoin DeFi believers
* ‚ÄãFounders & builders

‚Äã**What to expect:**

* ‚Äã30+ attendees
* ‚ÄãNetworking throughout the evening
* ‚ÄãSwag
* ‚ÄãDrinks & Bites

‚Äã**üìÜ Schedule:**

‚Äã18:00 | Doors open   
18:00 - 21:00 | Networking   
21:00 | End

‚Äã**üîé About the meetup**

‚ÄãBOB Hybrid & Chill is a global series of in-person meetups designed for the BOB community. Whether you're building on BOB, exploring what BOB is, or curious why the Hybrid L2 is the future‚Äîthis is the place to get your questions answered.

‚Äã**About the host**

BOB ("Build on Bitcoin") is a Hybrid Layer-2 blockchain that combines the strengths of Bitcoin and Ethereum to create the ideal home for Bitcoin DeFi. The unique Hybrid L2 model merges the best of both ecosystems‚ÄîBitcoin's security and liquidity, with Ethereum's DeFi innovation, applications and active user base. By positioning BTC as the backbone of a new decentralized finance system, BOB can unlock new use cases and trillions in BTC liquidity.

*_Disclaimer:_

‚Äã_Event Photos and Videos: By attending this event, you consent to being photographed or recorded. BOB may use this content for marketing and publicity, including on its website, blog, social media, or third-party publications._

‚Äã_Data Usage: By registering, you agree that BOB may collect and use the information you provide‚Äîsuch as your name, email, and Telegram username‚Äîto support event operations and follow-up communication._

name: ZK Hack X EthereumCzech Meetup in Prague
short_description: Join us for a casual meetup with the ZK Hack and EthereumCzech communities. No talks, just good vibes and zk-chats!

name: Chain Reaction: Pre-ETH Global Dev Meetup
short_description: Pre-ETHGlobal Hackathon meetup by Rootstock. Connect, brainstorm, and meet fellow builders. Food, drinks, and merch provided.
description:
‚ÄãAre you attending ETHGlobal Hackathon in Prague? Looking to connect, brainstorm ideas, and meet fellow builders before the event kicks off?

‚Äã‚ÄãJoin Rootstock for a laid-back pre-hackathon meetup in Prague! 

‚Äã‚ÄãThis is your chance to meet like-minded hackers, bounce ideas around, and get inspired‚Äîall in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere. No formal agenda‚Äîjust good conversations, great people, and plenty of fun.

‚Äã‚ÄãWe've got food, drinks and exclusive Rootstock merch waiting for you. Whether you're new to Rootstock or already familiar, our team will be there to chat about how you can leverage your Ethereum skills to build on Bitcoin.  
  
‚Äã**Who's joining?**  
üî• **Rootstock Collective** ‚Äì Empowering and rewarding builders and backers to drive innovation in Bitcoin's most trusted Layer 2.  
üåç **Flow** ‚Äì The leader in Web3 consumer crypto apps, with over **40M+ on-chain wallets** spanning X, Instagram, collectibles and more.  
  
**About Rootstock**

‚Äã‚ÄãRootstock has been the leading Bitcoin Layer 2 since 2018, combining Ethereum's development ecosystem with Bitcoin's security and decentralization. It's fully EVM-compatible, supports Solidity, and leverages over 80% of Bitcoin's hash power through merged-mined proof-of-work. Translation? You can take your Ethereum skills, deploy them on Bitcoin, and build something epic‚Äîno extra tools needed. Ready to dive in?

name: Web3Privacy Now Meetup x ETHPrague
short_description: A privacy-focused meetup bringing together advocates for digital rights and freedom.
description: A half-day dedicated to fostering solidarity and understanding among Open Source and human rights advocates, public goods developers, internet freedom defenders, and grassroots movements. Web3Privacy Now is a think-and-do-tank committed to protecting and advancing civil liberties, decentralization, and open-source software.

name: ETH Prague isn't over: Ackee Breakfast Meetup
short_description: Morning snack & chat with web3 enthusiasts and security experts.
description: Stop by for a morning snack & chat with fellow web3 enthusiasts and blockchain security experts. The breakfast hosted by Ackee is the perfect opportunity to connect and recharge before another day full of action.

name: Beerfi Prague - Web3 on-chain dev Meetup #37
short_description: A monthly meetup for Web3 builders, smart contract programmers and auditors.
description: Once a month on the last Tuesday, we bring together Web3 builders - smart contract programmers and auditors. Whether you are a Web2 developer interested to learn more or a senior in the Web3 sphere, our meetup is for you! Enjoy a nice cold lager and get ready to blow your mind on what's possible in blockchain.

name: ETHGlobal Happy Hour Prague
short_description: Connect with the ETHGlobal community in Prague.
description: Get ready to party with the ETHGlobal community in the heart of Prague! On Thursday, May 29 2025, from 6:00 PM to 8:30 PM, join for an unforgettable evening of drinks, laughs, and making new connections. Whether you're a blockchain enthusiast, a hacker, or just someone who loves a good time, this is the place to be.

name: Verifiable Brunch with vlayer
short_description: Pull up for a brunch gathering with builders, founders, and funders pushing the frontier of verifiability in Web3.
description:
Pull up for a brunch gathering with builders, founders, and funders pushing the frontier of verifiability in Web3.

Verifiable Brunch with vlayer brings together hackathon teams, early-stage founders, protocol devs, and ecosystem explorers working on governance, identity, data infra, and zero-knowledge tooling. If you're thinking in attestations, proofs, and modular coordination‚Äîthis is your space.

Our agenda mirrors the lifecycle of a verifiable project:

* Build ‚Üí Launch fast with composable tools
* Grow ‚Üí Activate your first believers and contributors
* Raise ‚Üí Navigate the path to capital in modular, infra-first ecosystems

Expect hands-on sessions, no-fluff convos, and quality brunch vibes with a community of on-chain builders.

name: Hacker Breakfast - Enter The Flow State
short_description: Hackathons are won before they officially begin. Join the Flow & LayerZero core teams to sharpen your winning edge.
description:
Hackathons are won before they officially begin.

This isn't just breakfast; it's your strategic head start. Join the Flow & LayerZero core teams to sharpen your winning edge. We're a 5-min walk from the venue.

Why you need to be there:

‚òïÔ∏è Fuel & Focus (9 AM - 12:30 PM): Breakfast is on us. The real gain? Critical insights and connections.

üß† Direct Access: Get unfiltered advice from Flow & LayerZero experts.

üõ†Ô∏è Refine & Validate: Pressure-test your ideas with experts before the sprint.

Walk in prepared to win, not just participate. This is your early advantage. Take it.

P.S. Scope out Flow and LayerZero's ETHGlobal bounties and strategize your win with us:
https://ethglobal.com/events/prague/prizes/flow
https://ethglobal.com/events/prague/prizes/layerzero

name: Build a Private Data Pipeline for AI Agents with Akave
short_description: Start your ETHGlobal Prague weekend with Akave's immersive, hands-on workshop focused on building private, AI-native data pipelines.
description:
Start your ETHGlobal Prague weekend with Akave's immersive, hands-on workshop focused on building private, AI-native data pipelines using our latest MCP server configuration and O3 (S3-compatible) decentralized storage.

Whether you're new to Akave or looking to integrate Filecoin-backed workflows into your stack, this session is your soft landing into the future of AI x storage.

**üîß What You'll Learn:**

* Intro to Akave: Why decentralized, programmable storage matters
* What is Akave O3: Unlocking S3 compatibility for AI workflows
  * Get exclusive access to our O3 functionality
* The AI x Data Opportunity: How to power your agents with private, persistent data
* Build Demos & Use Cases:
  * AI pipelines with Rclone, Snowflake, MCP Server, VLC, and more
  * Step-by-step: Build private AI agents that talk to your data
* Feedback + Idea Jam: Share your project ideas, get live feedback, and maybe win some exclusive Akave swag üß¢‚ú®

**üåü Perks:**

* Early access to the Akave O3 SDK
* Direct feedback from Akave CTO, Angelo Schalley and the Akave core team
* Chill builder lounge vibes with free breakfast, coffee, swag, and community energy

Whether you're building solo or forming a team, this is the perfect space to experiment, ask questions, and connect - all before the hackathon chaos kicks off.

**üóì Agenda**

9:30 - 10:00 am: Arrival, Welcome Drinks (coffee, tea, check-in) & Breakfast

10:00 ‚Äì 10:15 am: Intro to Akave + Filecoin ‚Äî Storage for Builders

10:15 ‚Äì 11:15 am: Hands-on: Communicate with Your Storage Using AI (MCP version)

11:15 ‚Äì 11:30 am: Connect 1:1 with the Akave Team

name: Crypto Rave by EVAA Protocol
short_description: An underground night of music, lights, and decentralized vibes during ETH Global Prague.
description: Get ready to break out of the conference bubble and dive into the raw, unfiltered side of Web3 culture. name: WEB3 VIEWPOINT | ETH GLOBAL OPENING MIXER
short_description: An exclusive early evening gathering for Web3 founders, builders, and VCs.
description: Join EVAA Protocol for an exclusive early evening gathering designed for Web3 founders, builders, and VCs looking to connect beyond the noise. Curated for meaningful conversations, aligned visions, and serendipitous intros. No panels, no pitches ‚Äì just good people, good wine, and sharp minds.
